meanings.definition: A type of predatory fish with sharp teeth and a cartilaginous skeleton.
meanings.sent1: The sharks swam swiftly through the ocean, hunting for food.
meanings.sent2: I saw a documentary about sharks and their hunting techniques.
meanings.sent3: The sharks decided to have a race to see who could catch the most fish.
meanings.sent4: Her sharp wit cut through the conversation like a school of sharks.
meanings.sent5: The image of sharks circling their prey is etched in my mind.

meanings.definition: A person who is ruthless or aggressive in business or sports.
meanings.sent1: The business sharks made bold moves to outsmart their competitors.
meanings.sent2: He was known as a shark in the world of professional poker.
meanings.sent3: The sharks in the office always went for the biggest deals.
meanings.sent4: She attacked the project with the precision of a seasoned shark.
meanings.sent5: The coach trained his team to be sharks on the basketball court.
